lead_paragraph: Orlando Magic forward Tony Battie will undergo rotator cuff surgery that is likely to end his season, the team said. He partly tore a ligament a few weeks ago in a pickup game. With Battie out, Adonal Foyle and the rookie Marcin Gortat could be called to fill the post beside Dwight Howard.
